The Bohemian Girl [arr. Round]
Kingston Mills, Hyde Promoted by Kingston Mills Band It is not known who the conductor of Mossley or Oldham Rifles were at this contest, but it is possible that Alexander Owen conducted all 7 bands. 10 bands entered, 7 competed Prizes: £23 2s, £16 16s, £10 10s, £5 5s, £2 2s
